sourcesContent:
Hoverable Rows With Horizontal Border

Hoverable row use a class table-hover and for Horizontal border use a class .table-border-horizontal , dashed border Use a class.border-dashed .tableclass.
@for (item of hoverableRowsBorder; track item) { }
Id Status Signal Name Security Stage Schedule Team Lead
{{item.id}} {{item.status}} {{item.signalname}} {{item.security}} {{item.stage}} {{item.Schedule}} {{item.teamlead}}
